import React from 'react' import { useState } from 'react' import { AiOutlineDelete } from 'react-icons/ai' import './index.css' const App = () => { const Array = [ { id: 1, Name: 'Adil', gender: 'male' }, { id: 2, Name: 'Inam', gender: 'male' }, { id: 3, Name: 'Dawood', gender: 'male' }, { id: 4, Name: 'Neelam', gender: 'female' }, { id: 5, Name: 'Kiran', gender: 'female' }, ] const [isArray, setArray] = useState(Array) const Delete = (id) => { const delete_item = isArray.filter(item => item.id !== id) setArray(delete_item) } return (
{ isArray.map((item) => ) }
Name Gender Delete
{item.Name} {item.gender} < AiOutlineDelete className='icon' onClick={() => Delete(item.id)} />
) } export default App
